meanings.definition: To suggest or endorse something as being good or suitable.
meanings.sent1: I recommend this book for you to read.
meanings.sent2: I always recommend this restaurant to my friends.
meanings.sent3: I recommend wearing a clown nose to the party for fun.
meanings.sent4: She recommended taking the scenic route for a more enjoyable drive.
meanings.sent5: The doctor recommended drinking plenty of water for a speedy recovery.

meanings.definition: To advise or counsel someone to do something.
meanings.sent1: I recommend you study for the test tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The teacher recommended that we review the material before the exam.
meanings.sent3: I recommend wearing sunglasses to look cool.
meanings.sent4: He recommended taking a deep breath to calm down.
meanings.sent5: The coach recommended practicing every day to improve your skills.
